title: Firewall Pop-Up ever since new patch
body:
Hiya

I'm guessing this is related to the multitude of other issues that popped up in the red exclamation mark, but ever since I updated and installed the new patch, whenever I open LoL I get a warning notification from my firewall.

replies.body: Just add "League of Legends" to your list of allowed apps in, im guessing you use windows, "Control Panel\System and Security\Windows Defender Firewall\Allowed apps"
